publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1735 Margaret Smith: Regulation of Care (Scotland) Bill, Stage 2—That the Health and Community Care Committee considers the Regulation of Care (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order of the Bill, save that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.

S1M-1735 Margaret Smith: Regulation of Care (Scotland) Bill, Stage 2—That the Health and Community Care Committee considers the Regulation of Care (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 in the order of the Bill, save that each schedule is considered immediately after the section that introduces it.
